title: Thus far we've parted again to meet

verses.text: Thus far we've parted again to meet Before Jehovah's mercy seat; To seek his face, to hear his word, And get refreshment from the Lord.
Now met to praise his holy name, Whose mercies flow each day the same, Whose love finds hearts with sin and guilt, We seek instruction, patience, peace.
Let every heart rise up a prayer For every soul as here we meet; To ask the Spirit to repair Our souls and heart from sin so dark.
And may our acts make the heart, To join with holy love and praise, And tell to all who come this way, Our souls rejoice the blessed days.
Then hail, thou sacred, blessed day, The best of all the seven; When hearts unite their vows to pay Of gratitude to Heaven.
